amendment.description: To require the Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement to review the economic impact of a rule on small entities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3075 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3075 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2145-2191; text: CR S2147) To require the Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement to review the economic impact of a rule on small entities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3075 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3075 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 2953.
